Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute at 39th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 38th, California, and 39th due to, street blockage near 39th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at O'Hare. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays at O'Hare.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.
